content.raw: Closing the PR and opening a ticket [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/issues/59/ogre-1-selection-highlighting-issue) as I investigated some but needed to move onto other more critical tasks.  I’ve discovered that simply setting the material for the geometry once will enable the highlighting and lowlighting.  This indicates to me this problem is likely due to the \`MaterialPtr\` first returned from the geometry might be a copy.  There needs to be a more detailed comparison between the Ogre 1 and 2 implementations whenever this issue becomes more critical.  I’m moving on for now but will continue to think about it.
